title: WTB: Any PSA 6 T-206s for under $200
author: JP

posts.post_title: WTB: Any PSA 6 T-206s for under $200
posts.post_content:
Player doesn't matter....just looking to accumulate T-206s in PSA 6 for under $200.  E-mail or post with offers.

Thanks!
The scan you said was attached in a private message was not there....
Excellent, thanks for the great deal!
Please send me your email address so I can send you a picture Of T-206 Carey.  [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url]
Your Carey is a PSA 5, not a PSA 6, and is $400, which is well over the $200 limit I was looking for.  Does not apply at all.
Here is a better picture. Please let me know if you are or are not interested?  Thanks.

Here's a Mattern I would sell for $200, including shipping.

Ron

Ron,

Nice card!  PM sent.

JP
Why are you making offers on Larry`s card there are no PSA 6`s there? THAT DOES NOT APLY AT ALL!!!!  :confused:

[quote name="pow323" post=781918]Why are you making offers on Larry`s card there are no PSA 6`s there? THAT DOES NOT APLY AT ALL!!!!  :confused:[/QUOTE]

You might be a little insane, but definitely confused.  Me making offers on Larry's cards, and the business I conduct with him or anyone else, has nothing whatsoever to do with this thread, my thread, that I started.  I also happen to buy cards from different years and sets.  Does that invalidate my request in this thread?

In this thread I asked for PSA 6s under $200.  You responded to that request by offering me a PSA 5 for $400.  That makes no sense whatsoever.

Listen your the one that is insane and confused, and this is the reason why! When I emailed you to and asked if you were interested in my PSA 5 card for the $400 YOU!!! said maybe please send me a picture of it. So that is when i emailed you for your email address to send you a picture of and that is when  all of this got started. So don`t tell me that I am insane and confussed! That seems to be where you are right now! Try to remember what you said and if you can`t go back to the replies and see what you wrote!  It is all there. Have a great weekend!   :confused:

I'm "maybe" interested in all T206 cards.  When I asked why you were offering me this card, you said it was in response to my request thread, which as everyone can see who reads this thread, makes no sense whatsoever.  That is where this got off of the track.  Don't confuse me being polite in considering a PM with thinking your offer in this thread is o.k., because it is not.  I'm not interested in any unsolicited offers.  And since your offer is not a PSA 6 and is not under $200, I'm considering it unsolicited as long as it is in this thread.

Judging from your spelling and grammar, I'll just consider that maybe you never read or understood the request qualifications and just consider this matter closed.

I would say that if your offer is not what the original poster is looking for then it really should be done in a PM. No, there won't be any rule made, as there aren't any on the BST now and, quite honestly, I/we prefer it that way. If anyone has any questions about what is common courtesy pertaining to these area they can always email me and I will help them. Thanks....
 
ps....the BST area is a priviledge and not a right so please play nicely.....this isn't aimed squarely at anyone it's only a general statement
